name: Ext_R5_AllergyIntolerance_verificationStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified substance (including pharmaceutical product).  The verification status pertains to the allergy or intolerance, itself, not to any specific AllergyIntolerance attribute.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` maps to R4B `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a non-`code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains the codes refuted and entered-in-error that mark the AllergyIntolerance as not currently valid.
